reviews.review_msg: not bad for a survey course he made it really clear whats we will be test on before exams.  if u  understand the  materials on practice exams then u should be fine

she assigned 4 assignments all due in one week and the following week we had a midterm. She thinks that you are only taking her class and will not compromise on deadlines. AVOID TAKING THIS CLASS WITH HER!! 2 hour lectures feel like 6 hours with her.
He was a great prof. He made the material very easy to understand and his lectures were enjoyable considering the topic.

I have to hand it to him. He was really good. Cant think of anything negative to say at all. He was really flexible if you had previous commitments during scheduled exams. (even final!) so i really appreciated that. Clear notes, clear lectures overall really good!
Easy class. I hope he doesn't scale down though. High clarity

He is very good at explaining the material and quite funny, which makes the somewhat boring field of stats interesting. His assignments and exams are very fair. Leaves blanks on his slides so you have to come to class, but it's worth it because he is one fine looking silver fox.

He is a great professor. Very willing to help by answering questions in class and in office hours. The homework assignments are very relevant to the tests, and he provided last years midterms as the optional assignment before the actual midterm and final. He is a super nice prof, and tries to be funny. His annotated notes are quite good.
